channel.title: PKers.net ~~ Pking server ~~ Perfect hitmarks ~~ Full constitution
channel.description:
[img]http://pkers.net/images/logo.png[/img] [size=14pt]BETA OPEN! TEST NOW![/size] Downloadable client: [url=http://pkers.net/client.jar]pkers.net/client.jar[/url] Webclient: [url=http://pkers.net/play.html]http://pkers.net/play.html[/url] website/forums: [url=http://www.pkers.net]www.pkers.net[/url] [SIZE=6]Fullscreen[/SIZE] [img]http://www.pictureshack.us/images/63228_fullscreen.png[/img] [img]http://www.pictureshack.us/images/67741_dclaws.png[/img] [img]http://www.pictureshack.us/images/52_autocasting.png[/img] [img]http://www.pictureshack.us/images/4518_edgeville.png[/img] [img]http://pkers.net/images/lumby.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/a1af19faaa75e5c8c934d9327a89be35.png[/img] [img]http://www.pictureshack.us/images/33291_hitmarks2.png[/img] [SIZE=6]Soaking[/SIZE] [img]http://www.pictureshack.us/images/11813_soaking.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
Pkers.net is a economy pking server project based on runesource.
[SIZE=5]currently done[/SIZE] Optimal emulation of RS2 combat. 550 and 634 Hitmarks (optional) Constitution via game server Hitsoaking (does not display for 550) Clipped following/projectiles (magic and ranged) Critical hit system with mask (634) Curse prayes (display leech/sap%) Degradable PvP weapons + equipment Smooth item switching + equipment updating Optimal combat with accurate formulas Proper Weapon animations Fast Xp rates Balanced economy High revision texture support Active pking (Edgeville, Magebank) Popular hybridding server Degradable PvP weapons + equipment chaotics full constitution Curse prayes (display leech/sap%) fullscreen resizable dclaws korasi PERFECT hitmarks smooth switching real FULL Clipped following Follow dancing clipped projectiles
[SIZE=5]What needs to be done[/SIZE] Gaussian implemented to combat Full summoning Unique custom minigames High revision graphics (602/634)
Developers: Brandyn(server/client) Casper(server/client) Sylas(website)
Credits: killer99 Brandyn - Owner/Developer of Point-Blank, Xyle, and Decimation
Will update with more later

item.title: PKers.net ~~ Pking server ~~ Perfect hitmarks ~~ Full constitution

item.description:
@ssylass wrote:


[size=14pt]BETA OPEN! TEST NOW![/size]
Downloadable client:
pkers.net/client.jar
Webclient:
http://pkers.net/play.html
website/forums:
www.pkers.net
[SIZE=6]Fullscreen[/SIZE]







[SIZE=6]Soaking[/SIZE]

[/SPOILER]

Pkers.net is a economy pking server project based on runesource.

[SIZE=5]currently done[/SIZE]
Optimal emulation of RS2 combat.
550 and 634 Hitmarks (optional)
Constitution via game server
Hitsoaking (does not display for 550)
Clipped following/projectiles (magic and ranged)
Critical hit system with mask (634)
Curse prayes (display leech/sap%)
Degradable PvP weapons + equipment
Smooth item switching + equipment updating
Optimal combat with accurate formulas
Proper Weapon animations
Fast Xp rates
Balanced economy
High revision texture support
Active pking (Edgeville, Magebank)
Popular hybridding server
Degradable PvP weapons + equipment
chaotics
full constitution
Curse prayes (display leech/sap%)
fullscreen
resizable
dclaws
korasi
PERFECT hitmarks
smooth switching
real FULL Clipped following
Follow dancing
clipped projectiles

[SIZE=5]What needs to be done[/SIZE]
Gaussian implemented to combat
Full summoning
Unique custom minigames
High revision graphics (602/634)

Developers:
Brandyn(server/client)
Casper(server/client)
Sylas(website)

Credits:
killer99
Brandyn - Owner/Developer of Point-Blank, Xyle, and Decimation

Will update with more later
